description: Hounslow Jamia Masjid & Islamic Centre is the largest purpose built Mosque in West London. Serving the needs of the local community and working towards the common good.

factsheet.heading: History
paragraphs: Amongst many historical elements situated at Hounslow Mosque, of the most prominent historical elements is the prayer chamber and the pulpit. They are considered as traditional and historical dating back to approximately 1400 years ago and the tradition of the prayer chamber dates back to the era of Mary, the mother of Jesus (peace be upon him).

travel_info: Tube: Hounslow Central, Hounslow East, Hounslow West
Additional travel info: Hounslow Mosque is situated right outside of bus stop Granville Avenue towards Bulls Bridge Tesco

name: Hounslow Jamia Masjid & Islamic Centre
